snippet.title: Robot Squad Simulator X - Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.microsoft.com/p/robot-squad-simulator-x/9pf03jpj4753

In Robot Squad Simulator you take role of an operator of remote-controlled robots used during military missions, spy missions and rescue operations. Among the machines there are ones that move through surface and there are flying and underwater drones. The main part of the gameplay is sixteen story missions that take place in varied areas scattered across the world.
